response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and history. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $750,000. I believe its true worth exceeds this amount, but I am willing to negotiate to ensure a fair transaction that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
